niagara.query_engine
Class QueryOptimizer

java.lang.Object
  niagara.query_engine.QueryOptimizer

public class QueryOptimizer
extends java.lang.Object

This class is used to optimize a logical plan and return an optimized logical plan

Version:
1.0

dataManager

Constructor Detail

QueryOptimizer

public QueryOptimizer(DataManager dataManager)
This is the constructor that initializes a query optimizer

Parameters:
dataManager - The data manager that the query optimizer can contact if necessary
Method Detail

optimize

public LogNode optimize(LogNode unoptimizedPlan)
                 throws NoDataSourceException
This function optimizes an input logical plan and returns an optimized logical plan

Parameters:
unoptimizedPlan - The unoptimized logical plan that is to be optimized
Returns:
The optimized logical plan. If there is an error during optimization return null.
Throws:
NoDataSourceException

getStatisticsAndUrls

private boolean getStatisticsAndUrls(LogNode logicalPlan)
                              throws PushSEQueryException,
                                     NoDataSourceException
This function walks a logical plan and contacts the data manager to get statistics and the list of URLs for the relevant DTDs. The logical plan is updated with this information.

Parameters:
logicalPlan - The logical plan describing the query
Returns:
True if no error occurs; false otherwise.
Throws:
PushSEQueryException
NoDataSourceException

collectDTDsAndSelectNodes

private boolean collectDTDsAndSelectNodes(LogNode logPlanRoot,
                                          java.util.Vector dtdVector,
                                          java.util.Vector selectNodes)
This function returns the list of DTDs reachable from the given node of the logical plan that do not have specific URLs to query over.

Parameters:
logPlanRoot - The root of the logical plan of interest
dtdVector - The vector to add DTD that do not have specific URLs to query over
dtdPredicateVector - search engine predicates
Returns:
True if no error occurred, false otherwise

getDTDWithInexplicitURLs

private boolean getDTDWithInexplicitURLs(DTDScan dtdScanOperator,
                                         java.util.Vector dtdVector)
This function adds the dtd scan operator to the list if it has URLs that are not listed explicitly

Parameters:
dtdScanOperator - The dtd scan operator to be checked
dtdVector - The vector to which the dtd scan operator is to be added if it has inexplictly specified URLs
Returns:
True if there is no error and false otherwise

updateDTDInfoWithURLs

private boolean updateDTDInfoWithURLs(LogNode logPlanRoot,
                                      DTDInfo dtdInfo)
                               throws PushSEQueryException,
                                      NoDataSourceException
This function updates the list of URLs associated with each DTD, based on information received from the data manager

Parameters:
logPlanRoot - The root of the logical plan of interest
dtdInfoHashTable - Hashtable containing information about each DTD, with the DTD id as the key
Returns:
True if no error occurred, false otherwise
Throws:
PushSEQueryException
NoDataSourceException

updateInfoWithURLs

private boolean updateInfoWithURLs(DTDScan dtdScanOperator,
                                   DTDInfo dtdInfo)
                            throws NoDataSourceException
This function updates the list of URLs associated with the DTD, based on information received from the data manager

Parameters:
dtdScanOperator - The dtd scan operator to be updated
dtdInfoHashTable - Hashtable containing information about each DTD, with the DTD id as the key
Returns:
True if no error occurred, false otherwise
Throws:
NoDataSourceException

selectAlgorithms

private boolean selectAlgorithms(LogNode logicalPlan)
This function selects algorithms for various operators. This represents primitive optimization

Parameters:
logicalPlan - The logical plan for which algorithms have to be selected for each operator
Returns:
True if no error occured; false otherwise

selectJoinAlgorithm

private void selectJoinAlgorithm(Join joinOperator)
This function selects a join algorithm for a join operator

Parameters:
joinOperator - The join operator for which an algorithm is to be selected
